trans-unit.source: Enumerates values for the state of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.
trans-unit.target: Enumera os valores do estado do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> property uses <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> to indicate the current state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.State%2A> usos de propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> para indicar o estado atual do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> properties use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> to indicate state of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.PreviousState%2A> e <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.StateChangedEventArgs.State%2A> propriedades use <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SynthesizerState> para indicar o estado do <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> quando o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.StateChanged> é gerado.
Indica que o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> está em pausa.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> is ready to generate speech from a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Indica que o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer" /> está pronto para gerar fala com base em um prompt.
